About James65535

In a nutshell...

A solutions architect focused on Cloud Infrastructure, Automation, and CI/CD.

This is a site for me to share content which others may find helpful; either from my personal projects or professional engagements. Thanks for taking a look!

Skills

Current Technologies of Interest:

  • IAAS PLATFORMS - {VMware vRealize Automation,OpenStack,vCloud Director}
  • PAAS PLATFORMS - {Cloud Foundry}
  • CONFIGURATION MANAGEMENT - {Puppet,Chef,Ansible}
  • CONTINUOUS INTEGRATION - {Jenkins,Bamboo,Artifactory,vRealize Code Stream}
  • CONTAINER TECHNOLOGIES - {Docker,Kubernetes,Swarm,Mesos}
  • SDN - {NSX}
  • LANGUAGES - {Golang,C++,Python,PHP,PowerShell}

Experience

  • Private IaaS Design and Implementation for a range of clients across industry verticals
  • Public Cloud IaaS Design and Implementation for Service Providers
